text: "Walking on Broken Glass" is a 1992 song by Scottish singer Annie Lennox and is the third single from her debut studio album Diva. It went to number 8 in the United Kingdom and Ireland, number 14 in the United States, number 58 in Australia, number 1 in Canada, number 23 in New Zealand and number 31 in Sweden. The music video features actor Hugh Laurie. ==Track listings== CD single Tracks 2 to 5 were recorded for MTV Unplugged in July 1992. UK CD single ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:Annie Lennox songs
title: Walking on Broken Glass
